Member Function Documentation

bool PhysicsEngine::addItem ( const string &  name,
const vector< double > &  pos,
double  radius 
)

Add an dynamic item to the engine.

A dymanic item will move, and have it's position updated.

Parameters:
name the id of the item in the engine
pos the center of the objects bounding sphere (vector of size 3)
radius the radius of the objects bounding sphere

bool PhysicsEngine::addItem ( const string &  name,
const vector< double > &  pos,
double  edgex,
double  edgey,
double  edgez 
)

bool PhysicsEngine::addStaticItem ( const string &  name,
const vector< double > &  pos,
double  edgex,
double  edgey,
double  edgez 
)

Add a static item to the engine.

A static item is an immovable part of the environment (like the ground).

Parameters:
name the id of the item in the engine
pos the position of the item (the center of the box, not the corner)
edgex the edge defining the bounding box of the static item
edgey ibid
edgez ibid

const string &  jointType,
const string &  jointProperties = ""

Connect two items together, with the give joint type & properties.

Both items must already exist in the engine
